casebody.data:
Daniel DELVALLE, Petitioner-Petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES, POLICE AND FIREMEN'S RETIREMENT SYSTEM, Respondent-Respondent. C-717 September Term 2017
080532 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 23, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004852-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
